text: The Farmer-Citizen Movement, Dutch: BoerBurgerBeweging (shortened BBB), is a Dutch political party. The Farmer-Citizen Movement was established in 2019. It focuses on the interests of the rural environment and especially on that of the farmers. Their leader and co-founder is Caroline van der Plas. Number of seats in the 2023 elections: 7 (+6). == Other websites == * Website of the FarmerCitizenMovement Category:Political parties in the Netherlands Category:2019 establishments in the Netherlands
